Class CannonComponent

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.components.BaseComponent
it.polimi.ingsw.model.components.CannonComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CannonComponent extends BaseComponent

CannonComponent

This class represents a cannon component that can be attached to a SpaceShip. Cannons are used to shoot at enemies or meteorites during specific adventure cards or game phases. Depending on their CannonType, cannons may be powerable (require battery activation) or not.

See Also:
